headline: The Pricey Stock Market Will Continue Climbing, Says Analyst. 2 Sectors to Watch, and 1 to Avoid.
summary: Despite trading at record highs, the S&P 500 can continue to climb on earnings and productivity, argues Adam Parker of Trivariate Research.

headline: Berkshire Hathaway Director’s Firm Sold Almost 30% of Its Berkshire Stake
summary: The investment firm of Berkshire Hathaway director Chris Davis sold nearly a third of its stake in Warren Buffett’s company.
